title: Please note that the MS Discovery Forum website is no longer actively maintained. You are welcome to browse the site but please be aware that some of the information will be out of date.
cleaned_text: This section provides key information about compounds under investigation for therapeutic use. The MSDF editorial staff has a list of approximately 100 compounds whose entries are gradually making their way into the database. In the meantime, please [let the editors know](mailto:editor@msdiscovery.org?subject=Drug-database%20suggestion) about crucial pieces of missing information from the existing records and tell us which compounds you would like to see next. Note: Under the heading "Class," IM = immunomodulator, IS
